document_data.name: Harglevargle
document_data.mainbody: '''Harglevargle''' was the [[ettin]] chieftain of the [[Clotskull]] [[orc]] tribe in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Once Harglevargle was the bodyguard of the orc chieftain [[Prook (orc)|Prook]], who had lead his tribe to occupy some levels of the subterranean [[Illefarn]]. However, around [[1484 DR]], Prook died during a dungeon collapse. Thank to the lessons learned from Prook, Harglevargle managed to become chieftain,
document_data.Personality: Like all ettins, Harglevargle had two personalities, '''Hargle''' and '''Vargle'''. Hargle was more serious and narrow-minded, while Vargle was curious and imaginative. However, they both enjoyed smashing stuff, counting coins, and busting heads together.
